On August 5 2009, Google announced the purchase of video software maker On2 Technologies for $106.5 million - its first acquisition of a public company. <ref>[http://www.google.com/intl/en/press/pressrel/ir_20090805.html]." ''[[Official Google Blog]]''. Retrieved on 6 January 2009.</ref>
